Tom Emerson wrote:
...

> Problem java.lang.NegativeArraySizeException occured when trying to 
> process 'http://www1.voanews.com/robots.txt' 
> <http://www1.voanews.com/robots.txt%27> at step ABOUT_TO_BEGIN_PROCESSOR
>
> Associated Throwable: java.lang.NegativeArraySizeException
>
>   Stacktrace:
> java.lang.NegativeArraySizeException
>         at 
> org.archive.io.RecordingInputStream.readFullyOrUntil(RecordingInputStream.java:186)
>         at 
> org.archive.crawler.fetcher.FetchHTTP.innerProcess(FetchHTTP.java:327)
>         at 
> org.archive.crawler.framework.Processor.process(Processor.java:102)
>         at 
> org.archive.crawler.framework.ToeThread.processCrawlUri(ToeThread.java:273)
>         at org.archive.crawler.framework.ToeThread.run(ToeThread. 
> java: 143)
>
A commit I made earlier today was supposed to avoid your seeing this 
exception.  Did you update recently?  If not, try setting your 
'max-length-bytes' to 0 in your fancy profile and in the problematic job 
in the FetchHTTP section.  Otherwise, I'm interested.
St.Ack

>
